post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Hello! My name is Jeff Vainio, I am a Technical Recruiter with PROCOM in Toronto. I am conducting a search for a client of ours in Toronto for a Sr. J2EE Developer/Team Lead for a 6 month contract. Please read the description below and if you are interested, please send me a resume in WORD format. No phone calls please, only suitable candidates will be contacted. THANK YOU!
Position: J2EE Sr. Developer/Lead
Required: The incumbent will be part of a team, designing, specifying and developing applications under a J2EE environment.
The incumbent will: -Understand and translate business requirements into Design and Specification -Lead and mentor small development teams to develop applications. -Assist and code complex functionalities -Document the developed applications and code such that the code is maintainable. -Support applications during their initial deployment phase with application enhancements and bug fixes.
Requirement: -J2SE (Java 2 Standard Edition) Senior -JDBC -J2EE (Java 2 Enterprise Edition) Senior -Session beans / Entity beans / Message beans -Security -JMS -XML (SAX, DOM, XSL) -JSP, Servlets -Experience with databases(ORACLE) and knowledge of SQL.
Tools / miscellaneous / concepts -CVS -Unix -Design Patterns -Ant -UML -XML -Jakarta Struts -Experience in the financial services industry -1-2 years of previous experience as a team-lead for a J2EE project. Strong people skills is a must.
Nice to have:
-Eclipse -JUnit -WebLogic -Oracle -Previous J2EE Team Lead experience in a Banking Environment
Location: Downtown Toronto Duration: 6 months Rate/Salary: $75/hr (if Incorporated as a contractor) Start Date: ASAP
PROCOM SERVICES A leading provider of IT services in North America, PROCOM and PROCOM SERVICES currently have more than 1200 consultants on assignment. For over 20 years, we have been finding high-quality jobs for our consultants. Our policies of maintaining open communication with both clients and consultants consistently make us the IT Firm of Choice.
We would like to thank you for your interest. Please note that all submissions will be assessed. However, only suitable candidates will be contacted further. NO PHONE CALLS PLEASE
Please submit your most recent resume to:
Jeff Vainio Technical Recruiter PROCOM JeffV@Procom.ca
post.title: J2EE Sr. Developer/Lead
